ISSUE.TITLE: [Feature] Autoscaler: Support external secret servers
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The autoscaler doesn't support external secrets like `drone/amazon-secrets`, because it doesn't set the necessary environment variables. It would be great, if passing the necessary environment variables `DRONE_SECRET_ENDPOINT` and `DRONE_SECRET_SECRET` would also be supported.
